#I will Survive! <VigzMv/>
from __future__ import division
import math

for t in range(int(raw_input())):
	n = int(raw_input())
	s = 0
	if n==1:
		print 0
	else:
		for i in range(2,int(math.sqrt(n))+1):
			if n%i == 0:
				if i == int(n//i):
					s += i
				else:
					s += i+ int(n//i)
					
	print s+1
